summary: Set in the late '20s. A thirtyish young man, who heads a small factory, faints at the funeral of a close friend. He decides to go home to his aunt and uncle for a while, but gets involved ... See full summary »
cast: Daniel Olbrychski|Anna Seniuk|Maja Komorowska|Stanislawa Celinska|Krystyna Zachwatowicz|Christine Pascal|Zbigniew Zapasiewicz|Zofia Jaroszewska|Tadeusz Bialoszczynski|Paul Guers|Kazimierz Brodzikowski|Andrzej Grzybowski|Jaroslaw Iwaszkiewicz|Filip Jasienski|Witold Kaluski|Jolanta Kozak-Sutowicz|Andrzej Lapicki|Halina Michalska|Kazimierz Orzechowski|Edward Ozana|Joanna Poraska|Alina Rostkowska|Barbara Stepniakówna|Andrzej Szenajch|Anna Wachnicka|Malgorzata Wachnicka|Krystyna Wolanska
title: Las señoritas de Wilko
